skill_hierarchy.name: Language Y1 & 2
skill_hierarchy.description: Students demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar and usage when writing or speaking.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is distinguished in understanding this skill.

skill_hierarchy.name: Language Y3 & 4
skill_hierarchy.description: Students demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar and usage when writing or speaking.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can recognize convention errors; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing simple sentences, although my accuracy may be inconsistent.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing a variety of types of sentences.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can recognize convention errors; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing simple sentences, although my accuracy may be inconsistent.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing a variety of types of sentences.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is distinguished in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can cite general evidence from a text to support the point I am making when speaking or writing. I can identify strong and thorough evidence in models that I am given.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can cite specific evidence from a text to support the point I am making when speaking or writing. I can rate evidence in models according to strength and thoroughness.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can cite specific evidence from a text to support my analysis when speaking or writing, determining both explicit and implicit meanings and drawing inferences.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can cite specific, well-chosen evidence to support my analysis of a text when speaking or writing, determining both explicit and implicit meanings, drawing inferences, and making the context clear.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can list major events or ideas in a text.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can summarize a text, and identify themes or key ideas within it.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can summarize a text, identify themes within it, and analyze how the themes or key ideas develop throughout the text.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can connect themes or key ideas in the text to my life and/or the outside world and analyze how those themes develop and connect.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is distinguished in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I have a list of urls from the sources I collected.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can create a Works Cited or References list with multiple sources that are related to my topic.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can create a Works Cited or References list with multiple sources that are pertinent to my topic. I have analyzed the sources and selected those that are reliable and either unbiased or appropriately biased to support my argument.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can create a Works Cited or References list with more than five sources that bring advanced understanding of the topic. I have analyzed the sources and selected those that are the best suited for my task, purpose and audience.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can select ideas, facts or quotes from literary or informational texts.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can select ideas, facts or quotes from literary or informational texts that relate to my topic.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can evaluate evidence from literary or information texts and select ideas, facts or quotes that support my analysis of, reflection on, or research about a topic.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can evaluate evidence from literary or informational texts and select a variety of ideas, facts, and quotes that advance my analysis of, reflection on, or research about a topic.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can recognize convention errors; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing simple sentences, although my accuracy may be inconsistent.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can correctly use conventions; including capitalization, punctuation, and spelling; when writing a variety of types of sentences.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished

skill_hierarchy.name: Reading
skill_hierarchy.description: Students comprehend, interpret, analyze, and evaluate a wide range and level of complex literary and informational texts.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished

skill_hierarchy.name: Speaking and Listening: Discussion
skill_hierarchy.description: Students initiate and participate effectively in a range of discussions, responding thoughtfully to diverse perspectives and expressing ideas clearly and persuasively.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is distinguished in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can identify sources of energy flowing into and out of a system.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can explain the change in the energy of one component in a system when the change in energy of the other component(s) and energy flows in and out of the system are known.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can create a model to calculate the change in the energy of one component in a system when the change in energy of the other component(s) and energy flows in and out of the system are known.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can analyze my model to make predictions about future energy changes in the system.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: I can identify the difference between frequency, wavelength, and speed of waves.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: I can explain a wave in terms of its frequency, wavelength, and speed.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: I can analyze relationships between the frequency, wavelength, and speed of waves in multiple contexts.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: I can use my understanding of waves to describe real world scenarios that depend on waves. I can predict how changing the waves in those scenarios impacts form or function.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is getting started in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is progressing in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is proficient in understanding this skill.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description: Evidence in the portfolio demonstrates the student is distinguished in understanding this skill.

skill_hierarchy.name: Habits of Mind - Habits of Mind
skill_hierarchy.code: Habits of Mind - Habits of Mind
skill_hierarchy.description: Habits of Mind - Habits of Mind

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description:
*I argue other points of view before I fully understand them.
*I know I should be kind and respectful to others, in person and online.
*I know that caring for and respecting equipment and  others

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description:
*I listen to opposing points of view. 
*I can be kind and respectful to others, in person and online.
*I can be respectful of equipment and others

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description:
*I listen to ideas and opinions of others and take risks to respectfully share my own opinion. 
*I treat others kindly and respectfully contribute to an environment in which everyone can learn in person and online.
*I am respectful of equipment and others

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description:
*I champion the rights of others and speak to disrespectful comments and behaviors in person and online.
*I model how to respect equipment and others

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description:
* I struggle to get started, participate in class, stay on task and complete my work. 
*I get sidetracked by electronic distractions but am learning how to use technology as a tool when appropriate.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description:
*I need reminders to participate in class, stay on task and complete my work. 
*I am capable of using technology appropriately.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description:
*I participate in class, stay on task and do the work expected.  
*I appropriately use technology as a tool to aid in my learning.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description:
*I exert the effort necessary to make my learning rigorous.  
*I appropriately use technology as a tool to aid in my learning, and I can be a resource for others.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description:
*I attempt to receive and incorporate feedback to revise my work or practice.
*I can identify what growth mindset is and how to accept challenges.
*I recognize that perseverance takes academic and social risks.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description:
*I am practicing strategies to receive and incorporate feedback to revise my work or improve my practice to meet standards.
*With prompting I approach challenges with a growth mindset. 
*I

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description:
*I accept and incorporate feedback to revise my work or improve my practice to advance my learning.
*I approach challenges with a growth mindset and seek assistance when needed.
*I take academic and social risks to further my learning.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description:
*I seek feedback in revising my work or improving my practice, and I incorporate feedback thoughtfully to advance my learning.
*I have a growth mindset, independently take on challenges, and intentionally seek assistance to improve my learning.
*I take academic and social risks to support myself and others.

levels.name: Getting Started
levels.description:
*I rarely come to class prepared to work with materials, and technology.
*I rarely meet deadlines and complete my work.

levels.name: Progressing
levels.description:
*I sometimes come to class prepared to  work, materials, and technology. 
*I sometimes meet deadlines and complete my work.

levels.name: Proficient
levels.description:
*I come to class prepared to work, with materials, and technology ready to go.
*I meet deadlines and complete my work.

levels.name: Distinguished
levels.description:
*I always come to class prepared to work with materials, and technology ready to go.
*I independently shape or organize my practice for optimal learning and progress based on feedback and self assessment.

levels.name: Distinguished
